full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Waskesiu Storm Drain Improvements Phase 2 – Prince Albert National Park

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Information:**

*   **Notice Title (English/French):** Request for Proposal (RFP) - Installation and Supply Services for Storm Drain Improvements
*   **Reference Number (Reference Numéro):** 5P468-22-0129/A
*   **Tender Closing Date (Date Limite de Soumission):** October 12, 2022, at 4:00 p.m. EST
*   **Purchaser Contact Information (Informations de Contact de l'Acheteur):**
    *   **Contact Person (Nom du Contact):** Jennifer Maheu
    *   **Email Address (Adresse Courriel):** <jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca>
    *   **Phone Number (Numéro de Téléphone):** (587) 432-8458
    *   **Fax Number (Numéro de Télécopieur):** 1-855-983-1808

**Project Description:**

An RFP is issued for the supply and installation of heated catch basin and force main along with associated works at the intersection of Lakeview & Waskesiu Drives and through the existing storm drain pipe under Lakeview Drive, connecting with previous work completed under Phase 1 of this project.

**Documents and Attachments:**

 All relevant documents and attachments for this RFP are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service, Government of Canada tendering service at [www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders). Such documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Bidders’ Conference (Conférence des Soumissionnaires):**

 *   **Date (Date):** September 14, 2022
 *   **Time (Heure):** 1:30 p.m. CDT
 *   **Teleconference information (Informations de la conférence téléphonique):** Provided to participants at the conference.

**Important Dates (Dates importantes):**

*   **Tender Closing Date (Date Limite de Soumission ):** October 12, 2022, at 4:00 p.m. EST
*   **Contract Date (Date de contrats):** February 28, 2023
*   **Bid Submission Instructions (Instructions de soumission des offres
